document.full_text: boyhood loss and the redeeming power of love stirred crowds at cannes with "the kid with a bike," a film about a boy on a desperate search for his father by festival favorites jean-pierre and luc dardenne.
document.title: dardenne duo move cannes with boyhood tale of loss
lines_and_colors: boyhood loss and the redeeming power of love stirred crowds at cannes with "the kid with a bike," a film about a boy on a desperate search for his father by festival favorites jean-pierre and luc dardenne.
